name: 2023 7th International Conference on Applied Economics and Business
content: Publication: Submissions will be reviewed by the conference committees and accepted papers will be published as a post-proceeding, which will be submitted to be indexed by Scopus, zbMATH, etc. Some selected papers can be recommended to International Journal of Trade, Economics and Finance for possible publication after being extended, which will be indexed by ProQuest, Crossref, Electronic Journals Library, EBSCO, etc.
